CustomField.description: The moment in time when the (last) renewal intent was registered on this Opportunity, coming from Self-Serve. This field is read-only in Salesforce and is synchronized periodically (nightly) from NetSuite!
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The moment in time when the (last) renewal intent was registered on this Opportunity, coming from Self-Serve. This field is read-only in Salesforce and is synchronized periodically (nightly) from NetSuite!
CustomField.label: Self-Serve Last Activity
